Package src.controller

Class RoomServiceManager

java.lang.Object
src.controller.RoomServiceManager
public class RoomServiceManager extends Object
RoomServiceManager is a controller class that acts as a "middleman" between the view classes - AdminView and OrderView and the model classes - MenuItem and Order.

It can create an order or customize the menu.

Both functionalities are included in the same class RoomServiceManager to ensure that any changes to the menu will be reflected during order creations (When ordering, the updated menu will be reflected)

Since:
2022-03-31

      Returns:

    • addOrderItem

      public static boolean addOrderItem(String name, String orderId, int amount)
      Adds menu item of the specified quantity to the customer's order
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the menu item to be added
      orderId - Id of the order
      amount - Quantity of menu item to be added
      Returns:
      true if menu item is successfully added to the order. Otherwise, false if menu item fails to be added (order Id is invalid/ menu item name entered does not exist in menu database)

    • removeOrderItem

      public static boolean removeOrderItem(String name, String orderId, int amount)
      Removes menu item of the specified quantity from the customer's order
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the menu item to be removed
      orderId - Id of the order
      amount - Quantity of menu item to be removed
      Returns:
      true if menu item is successfully removed from the order. Otherwise, false if menu item fails to be removed (order Id is invalid/ menu item name entered does not exist in order or menu database)

      public static boolean updateStatus(OrderStatus newOrderStatus, String orderId)
      Update the status of the order of the specified order Id
      Parameters:

      orderId - Order Id of the order
      Returns:

    • removeEntireOrderOfRoom

      public static boolean removeEntireOrderOfRoom(String roomId)
      Clears the entire order history of the room after the user has checked out

      Calls RoomManager to validate room id.

      Parameters:
      roomId - Id of the room
      Returns:
      true if removal of order is successful. Otherwise, false if room id not found.

    • validateOrderId

      public static boolean validateOrderId(String orderId)
      Checks if order Id is in the database for validation
      Parameters:
      orderId - Order Id of the order
      Returns:
      true if order Id is found in the database. Otherwise, false if order Id is not found in database

      Parameters:

      Returns:

      public static boolean addMenuItem(String name, String description, double price)
      Adds a new menu item, with details of its name, preparation description and price to the menu
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the menu item to be added
      description - Description of the menu item to be added
      price - Price of the menu item to be added
      Returns:
      true if menu item is added successfully. Otherwise, false if menu item fails to be added (Duplicated menu item)

    • updateMenuItem

      public static boolean updateMenuItem(String name, String description, double price)
      Updates an existing menu item, with details of its name, preparation description and price to the menu
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the menu item to be updated
      description - Description of the updated menu item
      price - Price of the updated menu item
      Returns:
      true if menu item is updated successfully. Otherwise, false if menu item fails to be updated (menu item not found in database)
